price: 43. And among them are some who look at you, but can you guide the blind - even though they see not?
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَنظُرُ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yanẓuru ilayka afa-anta tahdī al-ʿum'ya walaw kānū lā yub'ṣirūna
